installers.description: Qlik Cloud multiple tenant monitoring app installer
installers.message: Please disable or delete this automation, and redeploy by creating a new automation and uploading the workspace from https://github.com/qlik-oss/qlik-cloud-monitoring-apps/blob/main/automations/multipleTenantInstaller.json. Ensure you take a note of any custom variable configuration in your current automation, amending the variable values in the new automation where relevant.

Please disable or delete this automation, and redeploy by creating a new automation using the Qlik Cloud Monitoring Apps deployer template from the App Installers category. Ensure you take a note of any custom variable configuration in your current automation, amending the variable values in the new automation where relevant.
